field.name: content_id
field.label: COM_JLIKE_VIEW_RATING_SELECT_CONTENT_TITLE
field.query: SELECT DISTINCT a.content_id as id, c.title as title FROM #__jlike_ratings AS a INNER JOIN #__jlike_content AS c ON a.content_id = c.id ORDER by c.id DESC

field.name: rating_type_id
field.label: COM_JLIKE_VIEW_RATING_SELECT_RATING_TYPE
field.query: SELECT id, CONCAT(title, ' (', IF(state = 1, 'Published', 'Unpublished'), ')') as title FROM #__jlike_rating_types
